definition: to kill/to murder/to attack/to weaken or reduce/to smart (dialect)/(used after a verb) extremely

sentences.english: She is the woman who killed her preacher husband in Tennessee.
sentences.chinese: 之前她在田納西州殺死了她的傳道士丈夫。

sentences.english: Killing the slaver overseer no longer results in karma loss.
sentences.chinese: 殺死口水監督員在業虧損不再結果。

sentences.english: Perhaps you can explain why the Dustmen want me dead.
sentences.chinese: 也許你能解釋死亡者想要殺死我的原因。

sentences.english: After killing a soldier, Christophe fled the country.
sentences.chinese: 克利斯朵夫在殺死一個士兵後逃離了這個國家。

sentences.english: The infection or venom from the bite could kill them.
sentences.chinese: 這一口帶來的感染和毒液就可能殺死我的羊。

sentences.english: Durge would take great satisfaction in being able to kill legions of his sworn enemies.
sentences.chinese: 德奇將從殺死整團整團的死敵中獲得極大的滿足。

sentences.english: I understand you were nearly killed.
It is a kind of liquid medicine , and can kill the epiphyte.
sentences.chinese: 一種液態藥水，可以殺死真菌。

sentences.english: Iago . I bleed, sir; but not kill'd.
sentences.chinese: 伊阿古我不過流了點兒血，還沒有給他殺死。

sentences.english: Salt acts by the osmotic effect of extracting water from the bacterial cell fluid.
sentences.chinese: 鹽能殺死細菌是利用滲透作用將細胞中的水分吸掉。

sentences.english: Killing an alien gives you some points.
sentences.chinese: 殺死一個外星人會給您加分。

sentences.english: The police have their suspicions about who killed him.
sentences.chinese: 關於是誰殺死了他，警方有他們的懷疑對象。

sentences.english: Kainat said that despite the pressures her family refused to kill her.
sentences.chinese: 坎娜特說，儘管壓力很大，她的家人仍不願殺死她。

sentences.english: What do the devs want them to be "easily" killed by?
sentences.chinese: 惡魔們希望他們可以“輕易的”被殺死？

sentences.english: The vine growers killed the sheep of the dwellers in the hills .
sentences.chinese: 種葡萄的人殺死了山裏人的羊。

sentences.english: Why did Denahi want to kill Kenai?
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼德奈荷想殺死可奈？

definition: to attack/to accuse/to charge/an attack (terrorist or military)
to kill/to murder/to attack/to weaken or reduce/to smart (dialect)/(used after a verb) extremely
to handle/to deal with/to cope/to get by with
to defeat/to overpower/to beat/to be defeated
to kill oneself/to commit suicide/to attempt suicide
